statements: SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT production_id, location FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT production_id, production_date, energy_type FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_type = 'Solar';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT MAX(production_amount) FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT AVG(production_amount) FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_type = 'Wind';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT energy_type FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT SUM(production_amount) FROM renewable_energy_production;
SELECT location, AVG(production_amount) AS avg_production FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY location;
SELECT production_id, production_date FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_type IN ('Solar', 'Wind');
SELECT production_id, production_date, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT location, SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY location HAVING total_production > 5000;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT production_id, production_date FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS production_count FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY location HAVING production_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE location = 'Texas' AND energy_type = 'Hydropower';

SELECT location, energy_type, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_amount > 1000;
SELECT AVG(production_amount) AS avg_production FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE location = 'California' AND production_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT location, SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, MAX(production_amount) AS max_production FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY location;
SELECT energy_type, COUNT(*) AS production_count FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY energy_type;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_date < '2021-03-31' ORDER BY production_amount DESC;
SELECT location, production_date, production_amount FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_type = 'Solar' ORDER BY production_date ASC;

SELECT DISTINCT energy_source FROM production
SELECT production_id, SUM(energy_output) AS total_energy_output FROM production GROUP BY production_id
SELECT * FROM production WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'

SELECT production.production_id, production.energy_output, COUNT(allocation.allocation_id) AS num_allocations FROM production LEFT JOIN allocation ON production.production_id = allocation.production_id GROUP BY production.production_id HAVING num_allocations > 0
SELECT allocation_id, production.energy_source AS source FROM allocation INNER JOIN production ON allocation.production_id = production.production_id
SELECT production_id, MAX(energy_output) AS max_energy_output FROM production GROUP BY production_id
SELECT * FROM production WHERE energy_source LIKE '%Wind%'
SELECT allocation_date, SUM(allocated_amount) AS total_allocation FROM allocation GROUP BY allocation_date
SELECT production_id, COUNT(*) AS num_allocations FROM allocation GROUP BY production_id

SELECT production_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM production GROUP BY production_id

SELECT production_id, MIN(timestamp) AS earliest_timestamp FROM production GROUP BY production_id

SELECT location, SUM(production_amount) AS total_production FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, AVG(production_amount) AS avg_production FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY location HAVING AVG(production_amount) > 500;
SELECT location, optimization_score FROM production_optimization JOIN renewable_energy_production ON production_optimization.production_id = renewable_energy_production.id;
SELECT location, SUM(allocated_amount) AS total_allocation FROM resource_allocation GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production ORDER BY production_amount DESC;
SELECT energy_type, COUNT(*) AS num_productions FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY energy_type;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location, AVG(production_amount) AS avg_production FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE energy_type = 'Wind' GROUP BY location;
SELECT location, MAX(consumption_amount) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;

SELECT r.location, SUM(r.production_amount) AS total_production FROM renewable_energy_production r JOIN resource_allocation ra ON r.location = ra.location WHERE r.energy_type = 'Solar' GROUP BY r.location;

SELECT r.location, AVG(r.production_amount) AS avg_production FROM renewable_energy_production r JOIN resource_allocation ra ON r.production_date = ra.allocation_date WHERE r.energy_type = 'Hydro' GROUP BY r.location;
SELECT e.consumption_date, r.location FROM energy_consumption e JOIN renewable_energy_production r ON e.consumption_amount > r.production_amount;
SELECT e.location, MAX(e.consumption_amount) AS max_consumption FROM energy_consumption e LEFT JOIN renewable_energy_production r ON e.location = r.location GROUP BY e.location;
SELECT * FROM renewable_energy_production WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS num_allocations FROM resource_allocation GROUP BY location HAVING num_allocations > 2;

SELECT r.location, SUM(r.production_amount) AS total_production FROM renewable_energy_production r JOIN resource_allocation ra ON r.location = ra.location WHERE ra.allocated_amount > 500 GROUP BY r.location;
SELECT location, AVG(production_amount) AS avg_production, MAX(production_amount) AS max_production FROM renewable_energy_production GROUP BY location;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction;
SELECT facility_name, production_capacity FROM EnergyProduction;
SELECT id, facility_name, production_date FROM EnergyProduction;
SELECT * FROM ResourcesAllocation;
SELECT facility_id, resource_type FROM ResourcesAllocation;
SELECT id, allocation_quantity FROM ResourcesAllocation;

SELECT facility_name, location FROM Facilities;
SELECT id, location FROM Facilities;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT facility_id, consumption_amount FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT id, consumption_date FROM EnergyConsumption;
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLog;
SELECT facility_id, maintenance_type FROM MaintenanceLog;
SELECT id, maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceLog;
SELECT EP.facility_name, EA.resource_type FROM EnergyProduction EP INNER JOIN ResourcesAllocation EA ON EP.id = EA.facility_id;
SELECT FC.facility_name, MC.maintenance_type FROM Facilities FC INNER JOIN MaintenanceLog MC ON FC.id = MC.facility_id;
SELECT EP.facility_name, EC.consumption_amount FROM EnergyProduction EP INNER JOIN EnergyConsumption EC ON EP.id = EC.facility_id;
SELECT FC.facility_name, RC.resource_type FROM Facilities FC INNER JOIN ResourcesAllocation RC ON FC.id = RC.facility_id;
SELECT EP.facility_name, EP.production_capacity, EC.consumption_amount FROM EnergyProduction EP INNER JOIN EnergyConsumption EC ON EP.id = EC.facility_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyProduction WHERE production_capacity > 1000 AND production_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT facility_name, production_capacity FROM EnergyProduction ORDER BY production_capacity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT facility_name, allocation_quantity FROM Facilities JOIN ResourcesAllocation ON Facilities.id = ResourcesAllocation.facility_id WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT facility_name, consumption_amount FROM EnergyConsumption JOIN Facilities ON EnergyConsumption.facility_id = Facilities.id WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT facility_name, maintenance_type FROM Facilities JOIN MaintenanceLog ON Facilities.id = MaintenanceLog.facility_id WHERE maintenance_date > '2021-06-01';
SELECT facility_name, SUM(production_capacity) AS total_production FROM EnergyProduction GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, AVG(consumption_amount) AS average_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, maintenance_date FROM Facilities JOIN MaintenanceLog ON Facilities.id = MaintenanceLog.facility_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'preventive';
SELECT * FROM MaintenanceLog WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(allocation_quantity) AS total_allocation FROM ResourcesAllocation GROUP BY facility_name HAVING total_allocation > 10000;
SELECT facility_name, production_capacity FROM EnergyProduction WHERE facility_name LIKE '%solar%';
SELECT facility_name, location FROM Facilities WHERE location IN ('California', 'New York', 'Texas');
SELECT DISTINCT facility_name FROM EnergyProduction;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(consumption_amount) AS num_records FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY facility_name HAVING num_records > 5;
SELECT facility_name, MAX(production_capacity) AS max_capacity FROM EnergyProduction GROUP BY facility_name ORDER BY max_capacity DESC;
SELECT facility_name, MIN(consumption_amount) AS min_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY facility_name ORDER BY min_consumption ASC;
SELECT facility_name, AVG(allocation_quantity) AS avg_allocation FROM ResourcesAllocation GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, COUNT(*) AS num_maintenance_logs FROM MaintenanceLog GROUP BY facility_name;
SELECT facility_name, SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY facility_name HAVING total_consumption > 5000;
SELECT facility_name, MAX(maintenance_date) AS last_maintenance_date FROM MaintenanceLog GROUP BY facility_name ORDER BY last_maintenance_date DESC;
